TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataProvider extends System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class XmlDataProvider Inherits DataSourceProvider Implements IUriContext
type XmlDataProvider = class inherit DataSourceProvider interface IUriContext

summary.span: Enables declarative access to XML data for data binding.

span.span: Enables declarative access to XML data for data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 在部分信任沙盒中，没有权限来访问给定的数据时将失败。In a partial-trust sandbox, fails when it does not have permissions to access the given data. 有关部分信任安全性的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 部分信任安全](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)。For more information about partial trust security, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md). 公开了以下方式来访问[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 可以嵌入内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据使用类。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 可以设置属性设置为的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据文件。You can set the property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 可以设置属性设置为。You can set the property to an . 执行的所有绑定的完整刷新时事件发生。 performs a full refresh of all bindings when a event occurs. 没有优化特定的节点。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 属性设置为`true`默认情况下，这意味着检索数据，并生成的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]默认情况下以异步方式的节点。The property is set to `true` by default, which means that the retrieves data and produces the collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes asynchronously by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行是即时或值的基础在后台线程上属性。The execution is either immediate or on a background thread, based on the value of the property. 调用此方法和基类的方法。This method is called by the and methods of the base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开了以下方式来访问[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 可以嵌入内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据使用类。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 可以设置属性设置为的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据文件。You can set the property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 可以将此属性设置为。You can set this property to an . 当对执行的所有绑定完全刷新事件发生。 performs a full refresh of all bindings on when a event occurs. 没有优化特定的节点。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 如果属性是设置，那么任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 如果属性设置，则清除属性和任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 设置以下属性隐式将导致这若要刷新的对象： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时建议。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开了以下方式来访问[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]数据。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 可以嵌入内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据使用类。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 可以将此属性设置为的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据文件。You can set this property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 可以设置属性设置为。You can set the property to an . 如果属性是设置，那么任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 如果属性设置，则清除属性和任何内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据将被丢弃。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 设置以下属性隐式将导致这若要刷新的对象： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时建议。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended. ## Examples 在某些应用程序，嵌入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]内联[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页可能很不方便，因为必须在编译时知道数据的确切内容。In some applications, embedding the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] inline within the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can be inconvenient because the exact content of the data must be known at compile time. 因此，您可以从外部获取数据[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]文件，如以下示例所示。Therefore, you can obtain the data from an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, as in the following example. [!code-xaml[XMLDataSource2#XmlFileExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XmlDataSource2/CS/Window1.xaml#xmlfileexample)] 如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据驻留在远程[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]文件中，可以访问的数据通过分配定义相应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)]到属性，如下所示：If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data resides in a remote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, you define access to the data by assigning an appropriate [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] to the attribute as follows: ``` ```

The inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析器使用此属性进行编译的嵌入的文字内容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]数据岛。This property is used by the parser to compile the literal content of the embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data island. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` --or-- ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *elementDataRoot**elementDataRoot* 必须的。Required. 包含的数据岛的单个根元素。The single root element of the enclosed data island. 如果没有单个根，`x:XData`作为数据源无效。Without a single root, the `x:XData` is invalid as a data source. *elementData**elementData* 可选。Optional. 代表你的数据的 XML。XML that represents your data. 可以包含任意数量的元素作为元素数据、 嵌套的元素可以包含在其他元素，以此类推，XML 的通用规则。Any number of elements can be contained as element data, nested elements can be contained in other elements, and so on, subject to the general rules of XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将处理`XPath`的表达式从属性。The method handles the `XPath` expressions from the property. `XPath` 不支持函数。`XPath` functions are not supported. 有关`XPath`表达式的信息，请参阅文档和示例部分中提供一些示例。For `XPath` expression information, see the documentation and some examples provided in the Example section. 设置以下属性隐式将导致这若要刷新的对象： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 更改多个刷新导致属性，使用时建议。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.
